## Supported Versions

We release security updates for the latest major version of the Goods Unite Us iOS App. If you are using an older version, we recommend upgrading to receive the latest fixes and improvements.

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 1.x     | âœ… Yes              |
| < 1.0   | âŒ No               |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a security vulnerability in this project, please help us keep the community safe by reporting it privately.

Please email **[security@goodsuniteus.com](mailto:security@goodsuniteus.com)** with:

- A description of the vulnerability
- Steps to reproduce
- Potential impact
- Suggested remediation (if known)

We will respond promptly and take the necessary actions to investigate and resolve the issue. Please do not publicly disclose the vulnerability until weâ€™ve addressed it and published a fix.

Thank you for helping to keep our project secure!
